name: MUTTER & KRUCHEN Partnerschaft von Rechtsanwälten mbB
goal: The firm's legal consulting practice is focusing on high level advice on complex German corporate and securities law for German listed companies, mid cap and family-owned companies (Mittelstand) and major stakeholders.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives: EU Company law upgraded: Rules on digital solutions and efficient cross-border operations
